insights.label: Engagement hotspots
insights.summary: Viewers lean in around minute 2 when the VIA ribbon is introduced.

insights.label: Skim vs. deep watch
insights.summary: Most guest sessions are under 4 minutes, but a smaller cohort completes full runs.

insights.label: Experiment area
insights.summary: VIA v0.1 here is fully mocked. Use it to explore how insights could feel in a real product.
